column4: I'm so glad that someone's crappy picture of a cat and some nasty tiled red crap is what comes up when someone tries to search for a decent chrome theme that fits with lucid's new appearance (http://techie-buzz.com/themes/ubuntu-lucid-lynx-theme-for-google-chrome.html)
its gorgeous. for the first time, I've changed my personal theme back to the ubuntu stock. I also had a very seemless upgrade process
